name: Popeye: Ijiwaru Majo Seahag no Maki
name_original: Popeye: Ijiwaru Majo Seahag no Maki
description: Popeye: Ijiwaru Majo Seahag no Maki (ポパイいじわる魔女シーハッグの巻, Popai Ijiwaru Majo Shīhaggu no Maki, lit. "Popeye: The Tale of Seahag the Wicked Witch") is a video game for the Super Famicom game console based on the popular Popeye franchise, specifically in the comic strips originally created by E.C. Segar. It was released by Technos Japan on August 12, 1994 exclusively in Japan.
